scripts.generate:models: echo generate models and API interface
scripts.rabbitmq:install: helm install rabbitmq-operator charts/rabbitmq-operator -n critik8s && helm install rabbitmq-cluster charts/rabbitmq-cluster --values settings.yaml -n critik8s

scripts.monitor-backend:install: helm install monitor-backend charts/monitor-backend/ --values settings.yaml -n critik8s
scripts.data-collector:install: helm install data-collector charts/data-collector/ --values settings.yaml -n critik8s
scripts.amqp-proxy:install: helm install amqp-proxy charts/amqp-proxy/ --values settings.yaml -n critik8s
scripts.critik8s:install: npm run monitor-backend:install && npm run data-collector:install && npm run amqp-proxy:install
